exceptions.exn: In environment a : nat -> R x : R H : Rbar_lt (Rabs x) (CV_radius a) Unable to unify "forall P : R_NormedModule -> Prop, locally (PSeries (PS_Int ?M2365) ?M2366) P -> filtermap (fun ptd : SF_seq => scal (sign (?M2366 - 0)) (Riemann_sum (PSeries ?M2365) ptd)) (Riemann_fine 0 ?M2366) P" with "exists If : R_NormedModule, is_RInt (PSeries a) 0 x If".

original: intros a x H. apply is_RInt_PSeries. apply H.
